item.title: Can Our Attention Spans Get Any Shorter? How To Communicate In Our Nanosecond World
item.description: Making information digestible and easy to process is crucial.

item.title: Comey Prosecution Gets The Benchslap Treatment, Because Of Course
item.description: The federal judge is unimpressed with the government's lawyering.

item.title: Simpson Thacher Becomes Latest Surrender Firm To Join Up With Trump’s International House Of Tariffs
item.description: What are they doing for the Commerce Department? Pro bono? Paid? Both? Neither? The silence is deafening and exactly the problem.

item.description: That's one hell of a team!
